name: CITY OF MEDFORD, OREGON
sampleDescriptions: Making appropriations for Transportation and Housing and Commerce, Justice and Science for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2018; Specifically advocating for adequate funding for CDBG, TIGER, Econ
Supporting funding programs for municipal governments, TIGER, trails and project streamlining. Support South Stage Overpass Project and Prescott Park.
Support preservation of tax exempt municipal bonds and private activity bonds, expansion of low income housing tax credit and restoration of advanced refunding and state and local tax deduction.
Support AFG grant for air/light vehicle; support regulatory streamlining efforts; support infrastructure funding for water, sewer, economic development and housing.
